relnotes.name: C Standard Library
relnotes.purpose: SUBSET of the C programming language Standard Library, allowing ported C applications to interface to native services, orginally written to support porting of binary-only Java VM.

deliverystep.name: PREQ2475: Splitting Mixed Header files for Base Services API
deliverystep.preq: Splitting Mixed Header files for Base Services API

relnotes.defect: Removed deadcode from SetVBuf.c in Lstdio

defect.title: Loki Project: 3rd Party IP found in STRFTIME.c

relnotes.defect: Re-Written Strftime.c to Remove 3rd Party IPR .

defect.title: SWAP_Wordscan: Fix the profanity found in Base Services code

relnotes.defect: Fix the profanity found in Base Services code

defect.title: [Coverity]-SYMBIAN.CLEANUP STACK errors on stlib in syslibs

relnotes.defect: Cleanup implemented for three files CFileDescBase-CID 2338, CFileTable-CID 2337 and CLocalSystemInterface-CID 2327
Free allocated memory before the pointers go out of scope and the memory is orphaned.
Cleanup stack creation is added into the function that uses it.

defect.title: tmisc3 of stdlib test fail in winscw urel

relnotes.defect: Add OPTION CW -opt nointrinsics in tmisc3.mmp to suppress inlining of math functions.

defect.title: Header files included by a source file is in incorrect case

relnotes.defect: Correct the case of the tchar.h header file in the include statement.

defect.title: STDLIB math.h functions do not map Symbian Math errors into 'errno'

relnotes.defect: Added mapping function to Math.h and LMath.cpp and applied to affected functions. Updated automatic test script.
add a flag to processing sign "+" or "-" in a string passed to strtoul().
Changed declaration of memcopare from extern to IMPORT_C.

defect.title: Remove migration SWD macro __HIDE_IPC_V1__ from stdlib

relnotes.defect: Remove the macro and delete unused code.
relnotes.minorchange: Upgraded interface access and status tags for identifiers used by partners.

deliverystep.name: Filename policy changes
deliverystep.preq: Updating the component source files to comply with the Symbian filename policy.

relnotes.minorchange: Symbian OS v9.3 component branched from common codeline

defect.title: GCCXML test build fails for STDLIB IEEEFP.h header file

relnotes.defect: Improved in-source documentation for setsockopt() parameters making clear which are and aren’t supported by Symbian OS.

defect.title: GCCXML test build fails for STDLIB IEEEFP.h header file

relnotes.defect: Fixed GCCXML platform compile error in the ieeefp.h header file.

defect.title: [System Build]: Compilation warnings for reent.h in Build M04078 vFuture

relnotes.defect: Removed compiler warnings caused by new Windows platform compiler.

defect.title: In libc/stdlib.h the #include "_ansi.h" should be replaced by #include "libc/_an

relnotes.defect: Fixed #include problem in the libc/stdlib.h header file.
